overview: Sean Spector is the Co-Founder and Senior Vice President of Business Development and Content for GameFly. Sean is also a member of the GameFly Board of Directors and has been since April 2002. From April 2002 to December 2005, Mr. Spector served as Vice President of Marketing and Business Development. Mr. Spector was previously a Producer at Disney Online, a division of The Walt Disney Company, and an Agent in the New Media Group at Creative Artists Agency. Mr. Spector attended USC and holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in Film from San Francisco State University.

relationships.title: Co-Founder/SVP of Business Development and Content/Director
